fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Communication
eu_initiatives: EU policies related to Plant Protection, Agriculture, Environment, Health and Trade.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: ADAMA is a member of the European Crop Protection Association.
goals__remit: ADAMA Agricultural Solutions Ltd. is one of the world's leading crop protection companies. We strive to Create Simplicity in Agriculture – offering farmers effective and efficient products and services that help them grow crops. With one of the most comprehensive and diversified portfolios of differentiated, high-quality products, Adama's 4,900 people reach farmers in over 100 countries across the globe, providing them with solutions to control weeds, insects and disease and improve their yields.
